casebody.data:
No. — . Original.

Ex parte. In the Matter of The Johnstown Mining Company, Petitioner. December 7, 1903. Mr. Robert B. Smith, Mr. Frederick W. Whitridge, Mr, Willard Parker Butler, Mr. Edwin T. Rice and Mr. Sanford Robinson for petitioner in support of motion. Mr. James M. Beck and Mr. John A. Garver opposing.

Motion for leave to file petition for a writ of certiorari denied.
